course_title: Topics in Italian Culture in Italian: Sustainable Food&Culture Italy
class_notes:
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 19 - June 29, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
Topic:  At the Italian table: Sustainable food and culture of Italy
course_description:
Summer. Offered through Emory Summer Abroad Program in Bologna. Cultural topics to be announced each summer. Course taught in Italian.
May be repeated for credit when syllabus changes.
prerequisites: ITAL 102 or ITAL_OX 102 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
